ygData.subject: SV: Your kidding me
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone saying that drugs aint bad dont know what the hell hes talking about, and that is what i was refering to with my yeah i´m with ya Greg. And please take
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone saying that drugs aint bad dont know what the hell hes talking about, and that is what i was refering to with my yeah i�m with ya Greg.

And please take this discusion somewhere else will ya.


/Askur

----- Original Message -----
From: Richard Slater <opium@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 9:35 PM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Your kidding me


> From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
>
> Yeah.... I'm with.. you. <looks confused>
> Nice message Zinken, for knowing nothing.
> I have no doubt that Dr. Greg over here is just making up his story.
>
> Maybe you'd like to join him in his drug clinic Zinken?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: errors-159870-3083-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com
> [mailto:errors-159870-3083-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
> Zinken
> Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 11:51 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: SV: [eq_wizards] Your kidding me
>
>
> From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
>
> Yeah i�m with ya on this one Greg!!
>
>
> /Askur
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Greg McTague <gmctague@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 3:01 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Your kidding me
>
>
> > From: Greg McTague <gmctague@...>
> >
> > Well..i STAND corrected. Hmmmm...No side effects from LSD...I am glad
> that
> > you corrected that ugly rumor of "flash backs". I'll have to inform some
> of
> > my former patients, that they are must have been affected by bad chicken
> or
> > something. Sorry all..i thought this was an EQ_Wizards list not the forum
> > for recreational drug users .
> >
> >
> > <<Message: 1
> > Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 08:34:40 -0500
> > From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
> > Subject: RE: Disappointments with everquest.
> >
> > Heh, I harvest all of my own indulgences. I don't buy them from dealers,
> > and I suggest not doings so because they put anything from rat poison to
> > embalming fluid on their products to enhance it (killing your brain in the
> > mean time).
> >
> > Now, about trying something new. How is whoever you got your information
> > about drugs so righteous? It seems you have a strong fear against them, I
> > would also if they are dealer sold, rat poison LSD is not very good for
> > you.Although opium and morning glory LSD have no known long term effects
> > (unliketobacco and alcohol).
> >
> > Also I noticed that my original spelling of disappointments was wrong.
> > Anyways what am I rambling at (another fun feature of substances) I need
> to
> > get to school.I give up on whatever we wear arguing about, lets never
> > mention it again.>>
> >
